songs.title: Running From The Law*
songs.lyrics:
*Lyrics From Snippet*

[Intro]
Whoa, Kenny
Yeah

[Verse 1]
All I want to do is fake, knock off
Don't want to make money, had the stock off (Woo)
And I got a sick wrist nigga, wish bitch (Yeah)
Ain't nobody this rare, take a flick, bitch
Stunting like you pop the shit like it's property (Watch out)
All my pockets hitting licks, I think about robbing shit
Only know I drive you crazy, homie drive the shit (Think about it)
Lately I've been selling that penny a gram, you know I be live as whip

[Chorus]
Yeah, running from the law (Yeah, yeah)
Running from the law, I'm scared
Running from the law (Uh, uh)
Running from the law, I'm scared
